author: GSnoodePlannen
post_text: July 4, 2019 at 3:26 AM#1I've got a question about Macro/DMX Profiles. Recently I started using a macro to assign DMX Profiles to Channels:Assign Profile ("X") At Channel X Attribute "DIM"Now I would like to use a macro to remove the DMX Profile from the channel, but I don't know how...Delete Profile ("X") At Channel X Attribute "DIM" seems to delete the profile completly instead of removing it from the channel.Also, at the end of a show/tour, I've used several DMX Profiles, and would like to use a macro like: Delete Profile 1 Thru At Channel 1 Thru Attribute "DIM".It feels like its a very simple/basic syntax I'm missing, I just can't find it. Thanks in advance

posts.author: GSnoodePlannen
posts.post_text: July 4, 2019 at 3:26 AM#1I've got a question about Macro/DMX Profiles. Recently I started using a macro to assign DMX Profiles to Channels:Assign Profile ("X") At Channel X Attribute "DIM"Now I would like to use a macro to remove the DMX Profile from the channel, but I don't know how...Delete Profile ("X") At Channel X Attribute "DIM" seems to delete the profile completly instead of removing it from the channel.Also, at the end of a show/tour, I've used several DMX Profiles, and would like to use a macro like: Delete Profile 1 Thru At Channel 1 Thru Attribute "DIM".It feels like its a very simple/basic syntax I'm missing, I just can't find it. Thanks in advance

posts.author: MrRump
posts.post_text: July 22, 2019 at 1:29 PM#2Hello,Assigning or removing DMX profiles on DMX channels only works via the Graphical User Interface (GUI).The assigned DMX profiles are visible via the path:"LiveSetup/DMXUniverses/Universe x >" but cannot be changed via the Text User Interface.The DMX profiles can be deleted via the TUI:"LiveSetup/DMX-Profiles 1 >" "Delete Thru"MA Support

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: July 22, 2019 at 2:02 PM#3this approach should do the job:CodeStore Profile "MyDisposableProfile"Assign Profile "MyDisposableProfile" At .......Delete Profile "MyDisposableProfile" /nc

posts.author: GSnoodePlannen
posts.post_text: November 26, 2019 at 2:54 PM#4A bit late to respond, but yeah, this is exactly what I was looking for, thanks!

title: Delete DMX Profiles from Channels
